name: 2017 International Conference on New Energy Vehicle and Vehicle Engineering
content: ●2017 International Conference on New Energy Vehicle and Vehicle Engineering(NEVVE 2017) - Ei Compendex & Scopus—Call for paper July.21-23, 2017\. ｜Hong Kong, China｜Website: http://www.nevve.org/ ●NEVVE 2017 welcomes researchers, engineers, scientists and industry professionals to an open forum where advances in the field of New Energy Vehicle and Vehicle Engineering can be shared and examined. The conference is an ideal platform for keeping up with advances and changes to this field. ●Publication and Indexing All accepted papers will be published in the digital conference proceedings which will be sent to be Indexed by all major citation databases such as Ei Compendex, SCOPUS, Google Scholar, Cambridge Scientific Abstracts (CSA), Inspec, SCImago Journal & Country Rank (SJR), EBSCO, CrossRef, Thomson Reuters (WoS), etc. A selection of papers will be recommended to be published in journals. ●Our Committee/ conference committee/ committee experts ●Program Prerview/ Program at a glance July. 21, 2017: Registration + Icebreaker Reception July. 22, 2017: Opening Ceremony+ KN Speech+ Technical Sessions July. 23, 2017: One day tour or Technical Sessions+ Half day tour/Lab tours ●Paper Submission 1\. PDF version submit via EasyChair: https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=nevve2017 2\. 2\. Submit Via email directly to:nevve@iased.net ●CONTACT US Ms. Janne Wong Email: nevve@iased.net Website: http://www.nevve.org/
